post: Thanks for writing this blog, and having an extra critical eye and not just accepting a hypothesis because it supports the authenticity of the shroud. You do a great service by staying skeptical until good evidence comes in. Keep it up. By the way do you know if there is a website with free high resolution images of the shroud? Thanks..
title: Promoted Comment on “I think I see the Shroud of Turin”

author: mark
post: Thank you, thank you, thank you, for saying, “…the case for evolution (which I believe in completely)…” I have had yet found an apologetic site that actually believes in evolution. I am more willing to believe what you say about the Shroud because of this statement. Thank you!.
